pages.text: 53|45|ara e'i ye, tini'i srsti karena yugala---purusa o nari
53|46|sukrabindu hate, yakhana ta sthalita haya
53|47|ara e'i ye, punarut'thana ghatanora dayitba tamra'i [1]
53|48|ara e'i ye, tini'i abhabamukta karena ebam sampada dana karena [1]
53|49|ara e'i ye, tini si’ra naksatrera raba [1].
53|50|Ara e'i ye, tini'i pracina ‘ada sampradayake dhbansa karechilena
53|51|Ebam samuda sampradayake'o [1]; atahpara ka'uke'o tini baki rakhenani
53|52|ara edera age nuhera sampradayake'o, niscaya tara chila atyanta yalima o carama abadhya.
53|53|Ara tini ultano abasabhumike niksepa karechilena [1].
53|54|Atahpara setake acchanna karala ya acchanna karara [1]
53|55|sutaram (he manusa!) Tumi tomara rabera kon‌ anugraha samparke sandeha posana karabe [1]
53|56|e nabi'o [1] atitera satarkakaridera mata'i eka satarkakari.
53|57|Kiyamata asanna [1]
53|58|allaha chara ke'u'i eta prakasa karate saksama naya.
53|59|Tomara ki e kathaya bismaya bodha karacha
53|60|ara hasi-thatta karacha! Ebam kamdacho na [1]
53|61|ara tomara udasina [1]
53|62|ata'eba allahake sajada kara ebam tamra ‘ibadata kara [1].
54|1|Kiyamata kachakachi hayeche [1], ara camda bidirna hayeche [2]
54|2|ara tara kono nidarsana dekhale mukha phiriye neya ebam bale, ‘eta to ciracarita jadu [1].’
54|3|Ara tara mithyaropa kare ebam nija kheyala –khusira anusarana kare, athaca pratiti bisaya'i sesa lakse paumchabe [1].
54|4|Ara tadera kache eseche sambadasamuha, yate ache kathora nisedhajna
54|5|eta paripurna hikamata, kintu bhitipradarsana tadera kono kaje lageni.
54|6|Ata'eba, apani tadera upeksa karuna. (Smarana karuna) yedina ah‌banakari ah‌bana karabe eka bhayabaha parinamera dike
